description: Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
warranty: Length to Weight Ratio (Drop 11): Ideal for players seeking a lighter swing weight.
features: Free and Fast Shipping: Enjoy quick delivery at no additional cost.
12-Month Manufacturer’s Warranty: Purchase with confidence, knowing your bat is protected.
Length to Weight Ratio (Drop 11): Ideal for players seeking a lighter swing weight.
Barrel Diameter of 2 1/4 Inches: Standard size for fastpitch softball bats.
Balanced Swing Feel: Ensures controlled and consistent swings.
Solid and Stiff Feel on Impact: Preferred by stronger players for a more solid contact.
Dual-Disc S1ID™ Barrel Technology: Ready for game action immediately, eliminating the need for break-in time.
IST™ Technology Two-Piece Construction: Provides a stiff and solid feel on contact.
X-Cap™ Design: Enhances performance and feel with every swing.
Certifications: Approved for play in USSSA 1.20 (New NTS Tested Stamp), USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC.
